org.opentcs.access.rmi.services

类 RemoteKernelServicePortalProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.access.rmi.services.RemoteKernelServicePortalProxy
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    KernelServicePortal, ServiceListener

    public class RemoteKernelServicePortalProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements KernelServicePortal, ServiceListener
    The default implementation for the KernelServicePortal.

    • 构造器概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RemoteKernelServicePortalProxy

        public RemoteKernelServicePortalProxy(@Nonnull
                                      java.lang.String userName,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      java.lang.String password,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      SocketFactoryProvider socketFactoryProvider,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Object> eventFilter)
        Creates a new instance.
        参数:
        userName - The user name used with the remote portal.
        password - The password used with the remote portal.
        socketFactoryProvider - Provides socket factories used for RMI.
        eventFilter - The event filter to be applied to events on the server side.

      • login

        public void login(@Nonnull
                  java.lang.String hostName,
                  int port)
           throws CredentialsException,
                  ServiceUnavailableException
        从接口复制的说明: KernelServicePortal
        Logs in with/establishes a connection to the remote kernel service portal.
        指定者:
        login 在接口中 KernelServicePortal
        参数:
        hostName - The host on which the remote portal is running.
        port - The port at which we can reach the remote RMI registry.
        抛出:
        CredentialsException
        ServiceUnavailableException

      • fetchEvents

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> fetchEvents(long timeout)
                                             throws KernelRuntimeException
        从接口复制的说明: KernelServicePortal
        Fetches events buffered for the client.
        指定者:
        fetchEvents 在接口中 KernelServicePortal
        参数:
        timeout - A timeout (in ms) for which to wait for events to arrive.
        返回:
        A list of events (in the order they arrived).
        抛出:
        KernelRuntimeException - In case there is an exception executing this method.
